3.title: Halloween Special
3.plot: Adriana gets in over her head when she realizes she less than twenty-four hours to plan a surprise party for her neighbor.

4.title: The Tutoring Gig
4.plot: Adriana gets a job tutoring Isabel's 10-year-old daughter, Madison.

imdb.plot outline: A burned-out overachiever, Adriana, drops out of medical school to follow her passion. Only problem is, she has no idea what she wants to do for the rest of her life. So, she works odd and unpredictable jobs in hopes of figuring it out. And in this economy, Adriana quickly realizes, having a degree isn't all it's cracked up to be.
imdb.title: Hired Education
plot: A burned-out overachiever, Adriana, drops out of medical school to follow her passion. Only problem is, she has no idea what she actually wants to do for the rest of her life.

A burned-out overachiever, Adriana, drops out of medical school to follow her passion. Only problem is, she has no idea what she wants to do for the rest of her life. So, she works odd and unpredictable jobs in hopes of figuring it out. And in this economy, Adriana quickly realizes, having a degree isn't all it's cracked up to be.::Michelle Dos Santos

The series follows Adriana, a burned-out twenty-something who has always lived by the books and done everything right to please her mom. When she drops out of med-school to follow her true passion, she quickly decides that before she can tell her mom she's dropped out, she needs to be successful in another career first. Only one problem: She actually has no idea what she wants to do for the rest of her life. There's only one way for her to find out: work different jobs until she finds the right one. And in this economy, Adriana quickly realizes, having a degree isn't all it's cracked up to be.
